Counts by Category

Source: R/data_tbl_functions.R
category_counts_tbl.Rd

Get the counts of a column by a particular grouping if supplied, otherwise just get counts of a colum

category_counts_tbl(.data, .count_col, .arrange_value = TRUE, ...)

Arguments

.data

The data.frame/tibble supplied
.count_col

The column that has the values you want to count
.arrange_value

Defaults to true, this will arrange the resulting tibble in descending order by .count_col
...

Place the values you want to pass in for grouping here

Details

  • Requires a data.frame/tibble

  • Requires a value column, a column that is going to counted

Author

Steven P. Sanderson II, MPH

Examples

library(healthyR.data)
library(dplyr)

#> 
#> Attaching package: 'dplyr'
#> The following objects are masked from 'package:stats':
#> 
#>     filter, lag
#> The following objects are masked from 'package:base':
#> 
#>     intersect, setdiff, setequal, union

healthyR_data %>%
  category_counts_tbl(
    .count_col = payer_grouping
    , .arrange = TRUE
    , ip_op_flag
  )

#> # A tibble: 25 x 3
#>    ip_op_flag payer_grouping     n
#>    <chr>      <chr>          <int>
#>  1 I          Medicare A     52621
#>  2 O          Medicare B     22270
#>  3 I          Medicaid HMO   15466
#>  4 I          Medicare HMO   13572
#>  5 O          Blue Cross     13560
#>  6 I          Blue Cross     10797
#>  7 O          Medicaid HMO   10018
#>  8 O          HMO             9331
#>  9 I          HMO             8113
#> 10 I          Medicaid        7131
#> # ... with 15 more rows

healthyR_data %>%
  category_counts_tbl(
    .count_col = ip_op_flag
    , .arrange_value = TRUE
    , service_line
  )

#> # A tibble: 30 x 3
#>    service_line                                 ip_op_flag     n
#>    <chr>                                        <chr>      <int>
#>  1 Medical                                      I          64435
#>  2 General Outpatient                           O          50526
#>  3 Surgical                                     I          14916
#>  4 Colonoscopy/Endoscopy                        O          11486
#>  5 Cataract Removal                             O           4930
#>  6 COPD                                         I           4398
#>  7 CHF                                          I           3871
#>  8 Pneumonia                                    I           3323
#>  9 Cellulitis                                   I           3311
#> 10 Major Depression/Bipolar Affective Disorders I           2866
#> # ... with 20 more rows
